Class com.chimu.form.client.DomainObject_1_AbsClass_FormInfo 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.chimu.form.description.SimpleFormInfoAbsClass
           |
           +----com.chimu.form.client.DomainObject_1_AbsClass_FormInfo
public abstract class DomainObject_1_AbsClass_FormInfo
extends SimpleFormInfoAbsClass
A FormInfo class provides the information to map a DomainClass to FORM.

DomainObject_1_FormInfo supports the MapperBuilder protocol to directly create the mappers required by the Orm. This default implementation is oriented to a single mapper, single table configuration. FormInfos that have different characteristics may want to extend from SimpleFormInfoAbsClass directly.

Subclasses should "extend" (override and call the superclass implementation) the method #configureMappers to add the DomainClass specific slots. Subclasses must implement #mapperName and #oidColumnName to specify the mapper to generate and the oid column in the table.

createMappers 
 public void createMappers()
Create and add to the Orm all mappers used by this builder. During this stage you can not assume any other mappers exist.
